Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene.gamecomponents

Class IslandGroupManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene.gamecomponents.IslandGroupManager
public class IslandGroupManager extends Object
Manager for a single island group
